Ancestral Knowledge.name: Ancestral Knowledge
descriptions: Increases your maximum Mana by 2%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 4%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 6%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 8%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 10%.

Shield Specialization.name: Shield Specialization
descriptions: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and increases the amount blocked by 5%.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 2% and increases the amount blocked by 10%.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 3% and increases the amount blocked by 15%.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 4% and increases the amount blocked by 20%.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 5% and increases the amount blocked by 25%.

Guardian Totems.name: Guardian Totems
descriptions: Reduces physical damage taken by 5% while under the effects of Stoneskin Totem.
Reduces physical damage taken by 10% while under the effects of Stoneskin Totem.

Thundering Strikes.name: Thundering Strikes
descriptions: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 1%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 2%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 3%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 4%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 5%.

Spirit Animal.name: Spirit Animal
descriptions: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 1 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 2 sec.

Static Wreath.name: Static Wreath
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 10%, and increases the number of charges by 1.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 20%, and increases the number of charges by 2.

Nature's Guidance.name: Nature's Guidance
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 1%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 2%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 3%.

Tribal Guardian.name: Tribal Guardian
descriptions: Allows the Shaman the ability to parry, and use Two-Handed Axes and Two-Handed Maces.

Elemental Shielding.name: Elemental Shielding
descriptions: Reduces the chance you will be critically hit by ranged and melee attacks by 3% while Lightning Shield is active, and increases the threat of your Lightning Shield by 50%.
Reduces the chance you will be critically hit by ranged and melee attacks by 6% while Lightning Shield is active, and increases the threat of your Lightning Shield by 100%.

Flurry.name: Flurry
descriptions: Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 20% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 25% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

Earthen Armor.name: Earthen Armor
descriptions: Increases your armor value from items by 10%, and increases your total stamina by 6%.
Increases your armor value from items by 20%, and increases your total stamina by 12%.
Increases your armor value from items by 30%, and increases your total stamina by 18%.
Increases your armor value from items by 40%, and increases your total stamina by 24%.
Increases your armor value from items by 50%, and increases your total stamina by 30%.

Maelstrom Weapon.name: Maelstrom Weapon
descriptions: Your critical strikes with melee attacks cause your next Lightning Bolt to cast instantly and cost no mana.

Elemental Weapons.name: Elemental Weapons
descriptions: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Rockbiter Weapon by 10%, reduces the threat of Windfury Weapon effect by 33%, and increases the spell bonuses of your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 5%.

Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Rockbiter Weapon by 20%, reduces the threat of Windfury Weapon effect by 66%, and increases the spell bonuses of your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 10%.

Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Rockbiter Weapon by 30%, reduces the threat of Windfury Weapon effect by 100%, and increases the spell bonuses of your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 15%.

Shamanistic Rage.name: Shamanistic Rage
descriptions: The Shaman harnesses the fury of the elements to enhance themself for 15 seconds. All weapon attacks deal 30% more damage during this time, and all damage taken is reduced by 30%. Every time The Shaman deals damage, they will regenerate mana equal to 30% of their attack power.

Unleashed Rage.name: Unleashed Rage
descriptions: Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase the attack power of allies within 20 yards by 2%.  Lasts 10 seconds.
Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase the attack power of allies within 20 yards by 4%.  Lasts 10 seconds.
Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase the attack power of allies within 20 yards by 6%.  Lasts 10 seconds.
Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase the attack power of allies within 20 yards by 8%.  Lasts 10 seconds.
Causes your critical hits with melee attacks to increase the attack power of allies within 20 yards by 10%.  Lasts 10 seconds.

Weapon Mastery.name: Weapon Mastery
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 6%.

Feral Spirits.name: Feral Spirits
descriptions: Summons 2 Feral Spirits under the Shaman's control. Lasts 45 seconds.
